trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column objects that represent the columns in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En samling av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne-objekter som representerer kolonnene i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataGridColumnCollection collection to programmatically manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column objects.
trans-unit.target: Bruke DataGridColumnCollection-samlingen til å programmatisk administrere en samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-utledet kolonne objekter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: These objects represent the columns in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Disse objektene representere kolonnene i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: You can add, remove, or insert columns in the DataGridColumnCollection collection.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til, fjerne eller setter inn kolonner i DataGridColumnCollection-samlingen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property is set to `true,` the columns created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>er satt til `true,` kolonner som er opprettet av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen er ikke lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control does not store the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the view state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen ikke lagre innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen i visningsstatusen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column every time the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til eller fjerne en kolonne dynamisk, må du programmatisk Legg til eller fjerne kolonnen hver gang siden oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control's state is reloaded and the control is rebuilt.
trans-unit.target: Angi en `Page_Init` funksjon som legger til eller fjerner kolonnen før det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollens tilstand er lastet inn på nytt og kontrollen opprettes på nytt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection are not reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Ellers endringene i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen vises ikke i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollerer det vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to display or hide each column.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om du kan legge til kolonner i programmatisk eller fjerne kolonner fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll, er det enklere å vise kolonnene statisk og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>til å vise eller skjule hver kolonne.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The order of the columns in the collection determines the order that the columns are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Rekkefølgen på kolonnene i samlingen bestemmer rekkefølgen som vises i kolonnene i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different column classes that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser annen kolonne klasser som er avledet fra <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: |Column Class|Description| |------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>|A column that is bound to a field in a data source.
trans-unit.target: | Kolonnen klassen | Beskrivelse | |------------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>| En kolonne som er bundet til et felt i en datakilde.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundColumn>

trans-unit.source: It displays each item in the field as text.
trans-unit.target: Den viser hvert element i feltet som tekst.

trans-unit.source: This is the default column type for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>|A column that displays a command button for each item in the column.
trans-unit.target: Dette er standard kolonnetype for kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn>| En kolonne som viser en kommandoknapp for hvert element i kolonnen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a column of custom button controls, such as Add or Remove buttons.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>|A column that contains editing commands for each item in the column.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>|A column that displays each item in the column as a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du kan opprette en kolonne med egendefinerte kontrollene, for eksempel Legg til eller fjern. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>| En kolonne som inneholder redigering kommandoer for hvert element i kolonnen. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn>| En kolonne som viser hvert element i kolonnen som hyperkobling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLinkColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: The contents of the column can be bound to a field in a data source, or to static text.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>|A column that displays each item in the column according to a specified template.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet i kolonnen kan være bundet til et felt i en datakilde, eller til statisk tekst. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>| En kolonne som viser hvert element i kolonnen i henhold til en angitt mal.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateColumn>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to control the content of the column, for example to display images.| > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn> class is the base class for the column classes listed.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg kontrollere innholdet i kolonnen, for eksempel for å vise bilder. | > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>klassen er basisklassen for kolonne-klasser som er oppført.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: It is not used directly in the DataGridColumnCollection collection.
trans-unit.target: Den brukes ikke direkte i samlingen DataGridColumnCollection.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control that corresponds with this collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontrollen som samsvarer med denne samlingen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"></xref> that stores the collection of columns.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref> som lagrer samlingen av kolonner.

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Legger de angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne til slutten av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object to the end of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å legge til en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-utledet kolonne til slutten av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>samling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control does not store the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the view state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen ikke lagre innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen i visningsstatusen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column each time the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til eller fjerne en kolonne dynamisk, må du programmatisk Legg til eller fjerne kolonnen hver gang siden oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control can reload its state and rebuild itself.
trans-unit.target: Angi en `Page_Init` funksjon som legger til eller fjerner kolonnen før det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen kan laste inn tilstanden og bygge seg selv.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection are not reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Ellers endringene i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen vises ikke i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollerer det vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to display or hide each column.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om du kan legge til kolonner i programmatisk eller fjerne kolonner fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll, er det enklere å vise kolonnene statisk og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>til å vise eller skjule hver kolonne.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object to append to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne objektet skal føyes til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne objektet i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samling i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object at the specified index location in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å sette inn en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-utledet kolonne objektet i den angitte indeksplasseringen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control does not store the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the view state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen ikke lagre innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen i visningsstatusen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column each time the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til eller fjerne en kolonne dynamisk, må du programmatisk Legg til eller fjerne kolonnen hver gang siden oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control can reload its state and rebuild itself.
trans-unit.target: Angi en `Page_Init` funksjon som legger til eller fjerner kolonnen før det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen kan laste inn tilstanden og bygge seg selv.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection are not reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Ellers endringene i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen vises ikke i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollerer det vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to display or hide each column.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om du kan legge til kolonner i programmatisk eller fjerne kolonner fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll, er det enklere å vise kolonnene statisk og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>til å vise eller skjule hver kolonne.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index location in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column.
trans-unit.target: Indeksplassering i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> som skal settes inn i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column to insert in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne for å sette inn i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: column is .
trans-unit.target: columnis .

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column objects from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner alle <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne objekter fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column objects from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne for å fjerne alle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-utledet kolonne objekter fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection.Count%2A> property is automatically set to `0` after this method is used.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>automatisk settes til `0` når denne metoden brukes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRowCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Copies the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection to the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index in the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Kopierer elementer fra de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samlingen til den angitte <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, med Start fra den angitte indeksen i den <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å kopiere innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>samling i den angitte <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, med Start fra den angitte indeksen.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The `array` parameter must be a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den `array` -parameteren må være en nullbasert <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En nullbasert <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> som mottar kopierte elementer fra de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The first position in the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: Den første posisjonen i den angitte <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> mottar kopierte innholdet.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall kolonner i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine the number of columns in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å bestemme antall kolonner i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Count property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Count-egenskapen brukes vanligvis under gjentakelse samlingen til å finne den øvre grensen for samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The number of columns in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> interface that contains all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> grensesnitt som inneholder alle de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne objekter i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> interface that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å opprette en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnitt som kan være iterated via enkelt kan ikke hente hvert element i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get the item currently pointed to in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til å hente elementet som er angitt i samlingen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden til å flytte til neste element i samlingen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the initial position.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å flytte enumeratoren til den opprinnelige plasseringen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method must be called after creating a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> object, or after using the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden må kalles når du har opprettet en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>objekt, eller når bruker den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden til å flytte enumeratoren til det første elementet i samlingen.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Ellers elementet som representerer den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen er ikke definert.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> interface that contains all <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> grensesnitt som inneholder alle <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne objekter i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer indeksen for den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne-objektet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine the index number of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden til å finne ut hvor indeksen for det angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-utledet kolonne objektet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>samlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object is not found, an index of `-1` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-utledet kolonne finner ikke objektet, en indeks over `-1` returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column to search for in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne det skal søkes etter i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index position of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen posisjonen for den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived object is not found.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>, som angir at det angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-avledede objektet finnes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the columns in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kolonnene i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samlingen kan endres.

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection can be written to in all cases.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen returnerer alltid `false` å angi at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>samlingen kan skrives til i alle tilfellene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om tilgang til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samlingen synkroniseres (tråden trygt).

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> class and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er avledet av den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>klasse og overstyres for å returnere alltid `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om egenskapen IsSynchronized, se den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>i alle tilfeller.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne-objektet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samling i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection at the specified index using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne indekserer til å hente en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-utledet kolonne-objektet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>samling i den angitte indeksen matrise notasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> til å hente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner det angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne-objektet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne for å fjerne den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-utledet kolonne-objektet fra en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>samling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control does not store the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the view state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen ikke lagre innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen i visningsstatusen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column every time the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til eller fjerne en kolonne dynamisk, må du programmatisk Legg til eller fjerne kolonnen hver gang siden oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control can reload its state and rebuild itself.
trans-unit.target: Angi en `Page_Init` funksjon som legger til eller fjerner kolonnen før det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen kan laste inn tilstanden og bygge seg selv.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection are not reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Ellers endringene i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen vises ikke i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollerer det vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to display or hide each column.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om du kan legge til kolonner i programmatisk eller fjerne kolonner fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll, er det enklere å vise kolonnene statisk og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>til å vise eller skjule hver kolonne.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne til å fjerne fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Fjerner et <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne-objektet fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samling i den angitte indeksen.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-derived column object from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne for å fjerne en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>-utledet kolonne-objektet fra en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>samling i den angitte indeksen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control does not store the contents of its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection in the view state.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen ikke lagre innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen i visningsstatusen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a column dynamically, you must programmatically add or remove the column each time the page is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil legge til eller fjerne en kolonne dynamisk, må du programmatisk Legg til eller fjerne kolonnen hver gang siden oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Provide a `Page_Init` function that adds or removes the column before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control can reload its state and rebuild itself.
trans-unit.target: Angi en `Page_Init` funksjon som legger til eller fjerner kolonnen før det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen kan laste inn tilstanden og bygge seg selv.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection are not reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control when it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Ellers endringene i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samlingen vises ikke i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollerer det vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you can programmatically add columns to or remove columns from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, it is easier to list the columns statically and then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> property to display or hide each column.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Selv om du kan legge til kolonner i programmatisk eller fjerne kolonner fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>samling av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll, er det enklere å vise kolonnene statisk og deretter bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A>til å vise eller skjule hver kolonne.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn.Visible%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"></xref>-derived column in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn"> </xref>-utledet kolonne i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> fjerne.

trans-unit.source: index is less than or greater than .
trans-unit.target: indexer mindre enn eller større enn .

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektet som kan brukes til å synkronisere tilgang til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> samling.

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Objektet returnerte i denne implementeringen av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the SyncRoot property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om egenskapen SyncRoot, se den <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>-egenskapen til det <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> som kan brukes til å synkronisere tilgang til samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om samlingen sporer visningsstatus endringene.

trans-unit.source: The IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmet IStateManager.IsTrackingViewState er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IStateManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"></xref> object is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection"> </xref> objektet sporer visningsstatus endringene; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved state.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tidligere lagret tilstand.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder lagrede visningen verdiene for kontrollen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns an object containing state changes.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et objekt som inneholder tilstandsendringer.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder lagrede visningen verdiene for kontrollen.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Starts tracking state changes.
trans-unit.target: Starter sporing av tilstandsendringer.
